# Tau MUD Engine

Tau is a toolkit for building text-based multi-player games or Multi User Dungeons (MUDs (opens new window)). Tau is built to run on Node.js (opens new window) in TypeScript (opens new window) on the awesome MoleculerJS (opens new window) framework.

# Features

  • Plugin based architecture
  • Hot-reloadable world
  • MongoDB (opens new window) backed persistent data-store
  • Powerful Entity Component System (opens new window)
  • React (opens new window) powered templates with full flex-box style layout capabilities provided by Ink (opens new window)

@tau/core →
